description: Use this table to report on anatomic pathology settings configured at the case type level. Refer to table LAB_AP_LAB_SETUP if you're looking for the equivalent items set at the lab level.

columns.name: LAB_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case type defaults associated with a case type definition.

columns.name: CASE_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the case type.
